<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Rework this for different kinds of MachineOperand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently assumes the Src for a match is a register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We might want to support taking in some MachineOperands and call getReg on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Similar to m&#95;SpecificReg/Type, but the specific value to match originated</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from an earlier sub-pattern in the same mi&#95;match expression. For example,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="comment">/// we cannot match &#96;(add X, X)&#96; with &#96;m&#95;GAdd(m&#95;Reg(X), m&#95;SpecificReg(X))&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="comment">/// because &#96;X&#96; is not initialized at the time it&#39;s passed to &#96;m&#95;SpecificReg&#96;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Instead, we can use &#96;m&#95;GAdd(m&#95;Reg(x), m&#95;DeferredReg(X))&#96;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipatternmatch/#a809eac8eaab0d6c672e05a93fa04a834"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/deferred-ty">deferred&#95;ty&lt;Register&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipatternmatch/#a809eac8eaab0d6c672e05a93fa04a834">m&#95;DeferredReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &amp;R) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> R; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE: When trying the alternative operand ordering</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (i.e. &#96;R&#96;). Otherwsie, m&#95;DeferredReg/Type will not work as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expected.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">      : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/binaryopc-match/#a114ab12c175b1cd9a6452d927694989c">Opc</a>(Opcode), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/binaryopc-match/#a73550a7097cb241fcc7dff309853ca7c">L</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/binaryopc-match/#af9e93db6344d2c30eae9213f1536bcd4">R</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/binaryopc-match/#a7a3bed68c87689c4510c602f959f32f0"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/binaryopc-match/#a7a3bed68c87689c4510c602f959f32f0">match</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>, OpTy &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;TmpMI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipatternmatch/#aa9bd186f4281a367fb872d17d0e7728b">mi&#95;match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipatternmatch/#ac48bb7526cd273b2dbeaabdc481d641f">m&#95;MInstr</a>(TmpMI))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/binaryopc-match/#a114ab12c175b1cd9a6452d927694989c">Opc</a> &amp;&amp; TmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ae5036d7a6318520089e8c654b95e76c1">getNumDefs</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">          TmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a432824f0975bb863478bf4ef3a5df258">getNumOperands</a>() == 3) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/binaryopc-match/#a73550a7097cb241fcc7dff309853ca7c">L</a>.match(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>, TmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">                <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/binaryopc-match/#af9e93db6344d2c30eae9213f1536bcd4">R</a>.match(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>, TmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>())) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE: When trying the alternative operand ordering</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with a commutative operation, it is imperative to always run</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the LHS sub-pattern  (i.e. &#96;L&#96;) before the RHS sub-pattern</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (i.e. &#96;R&#96;). Otherwsie, m&#95;DeferredReg/Type will not work as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expected.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">               (Commutable &amp;&amp; (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/binaryopc-match/#a73550a7097cb241fcc7dff309853ca7c">L</a>.match(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>, TmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="comment">/// G&#95;ICMP matcher that also matches commuted compares.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="comment">/// E.g.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="comment">/// m&#95;c&#95;GICmp(m&#95;Pred(...), m&#95;GAdd(...), m&#95;GSub(...))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Could match both of:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="comment">/// icmp ugt (add x, y) (sub a, b)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="comment">/// icmp ult (sub a, b) (add x, y)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pred, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RHS&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CompareOp&#95;match&lt;Pred, LHS, RHS, TargetOpcode::G&#95;ICMP, true&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipatternmatch/#acaa11e6486fead6bca99e2cd215a9a3e"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipatternmatch/#acaa11e6486fead6bca99e2cd215a9a3e">m&#95;c&#95;GICmp</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pred &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a> &amp;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a> &amp;R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mipatternmatch/compareop-match">CompareOp&#95;match&lt;Pred, LHS, RHS, TargetOpcode::G&#95;ICMP, true&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>, L, R);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="comment">/// G&#95;FCMP matcher that also matches commuted compares.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="comment">/// E.g.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="comment">/// m&#95;c&#95;GFCmp(m&#95;Pred(...), m&#95;FAdd(...), m&#95;GFMul(...))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Could match both of:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fcmp ogt (fadd x, y) (fmul a, b)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fcmp olt (fmul a, b) (fadd x, y)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
